title: Complete Corruption
description: This is a previously-published edition - ASIN: B01A73QLBQ Can be read as a STANDALONE! Theresa Drazen can have plenty of guys, but the one she can't keep away from.... the one she's just about addicted to, is more than forbidden. With felony-black eyes and a mouth built for lies, loving him is one step away from illegal. But her body keeps overriding her brain. Maybe it's time to stop playing by the rules. ------- Antonio is obsessed. Theresa's the last woman he should touch. She's going to get him killed. She's dangerous. Poison. The wrong woman. Except... she's perfect.  And they both figure... one more time. Just one more time. One more time and they won't get caught. One more time and they won't get killed. One. More. Time.......  **MATURE AUDIENCES--Rough sex. Dirty talk. Criminal activity. Cursing. Fisticuffs. Closed course. Professional driver. Do not try this at home.**
author: C.D. Reiss
